title: Flight Document
description: Stores information about one flight, including launch window and payloads.

type.title: Document Type
type.description: Indicates that this is a flight document. Should be set to 'flight'.

approved.title: Flight Document Approval Status
approved.description: The approval status of this flight. Unapproved flights are hidden by default. Flights are approved by admins.

start.title: Start of Launch Window
start.description: A date in RFC3339 format that indicates the start of validity for this flight document.

end.title: End of Launch Window
end.description: A date in RFC3339 format that indicates the last date of validity for this flight document.

name.title: Launch Name
name.description: A human-readable name to refer to this launch by.

time.title: Launch Time
time.description: The (possibly estimated) time of actual launch in RFC3339 format.

timezone.title: Launch Timezone
timezone.description: The timezone the launch occurred in, as an Olson specifer (e.g. Europe/London).

latitude.title: Launch Latitude
latitude.description: Latitude launch occured at, in decimal degrees.

longitude.title: Launch Longitude
longitude.description: Longitude launch occured at, in decimal degrees.

altitude.title: Launch Altitude
altitude.description: Altitude launch occured at, in metres above mean sea level.

metadata.title: Flight Metadata
metadata.description: Any other informative data about the flight. May contain any fields.

location.title: Launch Location
location.description: Optional human-readable string for launch location, e.g., a city name.

project.title: Project
project.description: The project name that this launch is associated with.

group.title: Group
group.description: The group(s) responsible for this flight.

payloads.title: Payloads in Flight
payloads.description: The configuration to use for each payload in this flight.

items.title: Payload Configuration ID
items.description: The CouchDB Document ID for a payload configuration of a payload in this flight.

aprs.title: APRS import configuration
aprs.description: Configuration for the APRS import daemon: telemetry for listed callsigns is downloaded and associated with the flight.

payloads.title: Payloads
payloads.description: A list of payload APRS callsigns to retreieve and save as payload_telemetry documents.

chasers.title: Chasers
chasers.description: A list of payload APRS callsigns to retreieve and save as listener_telemetry documents with the chase property set to true.
